#	update November 2017: added spin and Porb info; 0 = no Porb known. Note that some Porb are tentative (see comment after src name)
#	update November 2017: Added new AMXP IGR J16597-3704 (Sanna+2017). Corrected that XTE J1739-285 was wrongfully listed among the AMXPs. 
#	update October 2017: updated points of IGR J18245-2452 (M28I) according to more accurate results (Ferrigno+2014) and PSR J1023+0038 following new results (Bogdanov+2017). Moved IGR J17062-6143 to AMXPs (Strohmayer&Keek 2017)

#	originally created April 2017
